comment.author: 20634999@N04
comment._content: Any Relation To Mike Anastasia Who In 2008 Is Blue Island's City Chief of Staff???

comment.author: 26985978@N03
comment._content: Intersting. I was born in Moline and grew up in Rock Island. I have been to Blue Island many times over the course of my trucking career. I now live in Oregon but it's still intersting to see new pics of the history of the ROCK pop up every now and then. john
